title: Weekly Digest (2 June, 2019 - 9 June, 2019)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 53 issues were created.
Of these, 22 issues have been closed and 31 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #8388 [Analyse bridge activity during opening of a chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8388), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8387 [[PERF] Remove dead code related to accounts.statuses](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8387), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8386 [[perf] get rid of platform specific code at compile time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8386), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8385 [Upgrade to react-navigation 3](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8385), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8384 [[PERF] List of strings and config in the code](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8384), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8383 [[PERF] Minify html, js and css](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8383), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8382 [[PERF] Remove SVGs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8382), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8381 [[PERF] Replace use of slurp macro](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8381), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #8380 [run checks and build steps in parallel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8380), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #8379 [[fix #8375] "save password" unavailable for non bioauth devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8379), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:green_heart: #8376 [Use cloudlare ipfs for stickers instead infura](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8376), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8375 ["Save password" is unavailable for devices without biometric authentication](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8375), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8374 [[WIP] more cljs modules](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8374), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8373 [Adding dependency causes Status to get stuck in logo](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8373), by [e18r](https://github.com/e18r)
:green_heart: #8371 [Black font (instead of grey) is applied for /send and /receive messages in preview ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8371), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8370 ["a.toNumber is not a function" when open collectibles (Ethermon, Cryptostrikers) ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8370), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8369 [Use `initialNumToRender` property + simplify our messaging FlatList.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8369), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:green_heart: #8365 [Error dialog is shown when switching languages on some android devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8365), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8363 [[WIP] Partitioned topic](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8363), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #8362 [/send and /request incoming messages disappear from chat after changing network](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8362), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8361 [[#8026] [Wallet] Signing transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8361), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #8360 [Move goog.i18n deps to a module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8360), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #8355 [Range error: Array size is not a small enough positive integer error shown when sending tokens in 1x1 chat](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8355), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8353 [Deploy postgres mailserver to the rest of the fleet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8353), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #8352 [json: cannot unmarshal hex string when token transaction sent without internet connection](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8352), by [asemiankevich](https://github.com/asemiankevich)
:green_heart: #8350 [[TESTS] Performance: time to load sign in screen (no save password)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8350), by [antdanchenko](https://github.com/antdanchenko)
:green_heart: #8349 [ "Confirmed"  transaction is shown for "Failed" in 1-1 chat ["Out of gas"]](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8349), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8348 [[Multi-Account] Account overview + individual wallet UI](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8348), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #8347 ["Tribute paid" message is always visible when open chat regardless of the message order](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8347), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8346 [ Can't get messages after paying TTT](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8346), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #8344 [[TESTS] Chatbot fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8344), by [antdanchenko](https://github.com/antdanchenko)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #8378 [rebase only PR builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8378), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8377 [Requirement for "Faucet request received"  replaced with ""Faucet request"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8377), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #8372 [poc Perf/chat comp](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8372), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8368 [[fix] crash on some android devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8368), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8367 [temporary fix for realm issues](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8367), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8366 [Can't launch mobile app after realm upgrade: Unfortunately, Status has stopped (Android 6.0.1, Galaxy S6 and S7) ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8366), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:heart: #8364 [[POC] simplify chat components for perf](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8364), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8359 [Minor fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8359), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:heart: #8358 [#6517 fix chat preview amount ios](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8358), by [Rikku-x](https://github.com/Rikku-x)
:heart: #8357 [always checkout to status-react folder](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8357), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #8356 [[wip] wallet module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8356), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #8354 ["Fetch more history" and fixes for e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8354), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #8351 [[perf][fix] typography](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8351), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8345 [[fix] externs for Preview Privacy Mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8345), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8343 [[fix] class calls](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8343), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8342 [[perf] small perf improvement for nested-text](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8342), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8341 [Error 'undefined is not a function...' if turn on biometric authentification](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/8341), by [annadanchenko](https://github.com/annadanchenko)
:heart: #8340 [[refactor] replace web3-prototype](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8340), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8339 [remove useless field in message subs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8339), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8338 [[perf] remove unused schemas and properties](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8338), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8337 [[perf] use objectForPrimaryKey instead of getByField](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8337), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:heart: #8336 [[perf] upgrade realm and improve schemas/queries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8336), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #8336 [[perf] upgrade realm and improve schemas/queries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8336), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received :+1: x0, :smile: x3, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #8368 [[fix] crash on some android devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8368), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received 23 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 37 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 18 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #8380 [run checks and build steps in parallel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8380), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #8379 [[fix #8375] "save password" unavailable for non bioauth devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8379), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #8374 [[WIP] more cljs modules](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8374), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #8369 [Use `initialNumToRender` property + simplify our messaging FlatList.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8369), by [mandrigin](https://github.com/mandrigin)
:yellow_heart: #8363 [[WIP] Partitioned topic](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8363), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #8361 [[#8026] [Wallet] Signing transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8361), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #8360 [Move goog.i18n deps to a module](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8360), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:yellow_heart: #8350 [[TESTS] Performance: time to load sign in screen (no save password)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8350), by [antdanchenko](https://github.com/antdanchenko)
:yellow_heart: #8344 [[TESTS] Chatbot fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8344), by [antdanchenko](https://github.com/antdanchenko)
:yellow_heart: #8334 [[developerXP] remove unused deps](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8334), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #8331 [DIVIDE APK SIZE BY 2 IN 2 LINES YOU WON'T BELIEVE THAT ONE TRICK ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8331), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #8329 [WIP: Make suggested gas 1 if less than 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8329), by [kirkins](https://github.com/kirkins)
:yellow_heart: #8327 [WIP Scan invalid qr-code and dismiss error with no redirect](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8327), by [krisc](https://github.com/krisc)
:yellow_heart: #8326 [don't exclude arm64-v8a libraries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8326), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #8317 [WIP  [Fixes #8066] Added native ENS registration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8317), by [jeluard](https://github.com/jeluard)
:yellow_heart: #8234 [Feature/onboarding setup](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8234), by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:yellow_heart: #8229 [[7105] Feature - Adding error for a field defined with range](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8229), by [alexanmtz](https://github.com/alexanmtz)
:yellow_heart: #7479 [[WIP] Change App ID for PR builds of iOS app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/7479), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 19 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #8378 [rebase only PR builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8378), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #8377 [Requirement for "Faucet request received"  replaced with ""Faucet request"](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8377), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #8368 [[fix] crash on some android devices](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8368), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8359 [Minor fixes](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8359), by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:purple_heart: #8358 [#6517 fix chat preview amount ios](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8358), by [Rikku-x](https://github.com/Rikku-x)
:purple_heart: #8354 ["Fetch more history" and fixes for e2e](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8354), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:purple_heart: #8351 [[perf][fix] typography](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8351), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8345 [[fix] externs for Preview Privacy Mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8345), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8343 [[fix] class calls](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8343), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8342 [[perf] small perf improvement for nested-text](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8342), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8340 [[refactor] replace web3-prototype](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8340), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8339 [remove useless field in message subs](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8339), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8338 [[perf] remove unused schemas and properties](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8338), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8337 [[perf] use objectForPrimaryKey instead of getByField](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8337), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8336 [[perf] upgrade realm and improve schemas/queries](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8336), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:purple_heart: #8333 [Update ko.json](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8333), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:purple_heart: #8332 [Move translations to node_modules in release build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8332), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #8330 [update open-login-callback after fx/def macro fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8330), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:purple_heart: #8304 [Feature/rework ttt](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/8304), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 21 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [don't rebase manual builds  Signed-off-by: Jakub Soko≈Çowski <jakub@status.im> Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/d75a412ae83791cfcdf69a75a7084bc411cfc9f1) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Requirement for Faucet request received is removed  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3e8b02616b5f4419ce60039cfc0edf4edba062e5) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] crash on some android devices #8368  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bea720f8d0e81598577ef0e5af1b2c7f8cfee23e) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Some changes from the node2nix test branch that don't need to be there  Signed-off-by: Pedro Pombeiro <pombeirp@users.noreply.github.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1457f0f017dd21538c4f08a3ee87c964fca937a0) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Move files that don't change per platform to the root](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ab11a67c9679cb662f3fa9dd1035a0ff9fdbf9ab) by [PombeirP](https://github.com/PombeirP)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[refactor] replace web3-prototype  - replace web3-prototype wherever possible - currently only the money namespace is left for future refactoring, the ideal solution would be to use strings for big numbers all the time and only convert for arithmetic operations - use json-rpc call to replace trivial web3 calls  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/04de022eae5c56b55b99951e65315fabb7e21e78) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update ko.json  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c8bd627de2f24e41e8a849be7aadca2219887277) by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fetch_message and e2e fix  Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6c76cc866c449dde4f75cb1ab50e2d7f5ab52b67) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] Move translation to node_modules in release build](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/632bbf3bc109186328ba758816e6ff4d97da1aa2) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#6517] fix chat preview amount ios  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/4f125aec439e84eafab7fb1da2b0d709762492be) by [Rikku-x](https://github.com/Rikku-x)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] last message preview  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c2b55233225f6e4d59c9ca5174b5261cc1137fec) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix][perf] fix typography on android  - remove font-weight and font-style on mobile because otherwise android falls back to default font and doesn't use the font-family - since nested text inherits from parent, only put the needed styling in nested text style - use parens instead of brackets to resolve components](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/bd6583cb76c790f3825a3c1320ed9b9bfabffe45) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] upgrade realm and improve schemas/queries  - upgrade to realm 2.28 to benefit from perf improvements - remove user-statuses and replace by seen and outgoing-status fields to get rid of a lot of bloat queries and computations - remove unused seen message, bottom-infos - remove unused fields in transport schema - use objectForPrimaryKey whenever possible instead of get by field  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1ae42ea424149fcbbeff0a5e5b0a862f3da5e475) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] class calls  This concerns: - touchable-opacity - animated-view - scroll-view  Tip for rebasing: search in project for `scroll-view)` `animated-view)` and `touchable-opacity)`  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b3df9d495258d22f3234c7d781fc3350d6c19087) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] remove unused schemas and properties  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1cb7f3b83f0310f0738ba31b97fa20e2554a1ee4) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[fix] externs for Preview Privacy Mode  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3826e3ecbd19a8c505378841c8c9f39204cfe241) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] small perf improvement for nested-text  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/48df741f8dd4750aa08983a09a71164fa379b8ab) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[perf] use objectForPrimaryKey instead of getByField  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a1d6ead6d38cc5a7aa72a54fdb1b6707c799691d) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Add TtT chat flow  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/04ccd0e7d8ad9bf07afcd53e846a64da65b490c9) by [siphiuel](https://github.com/siphiuel)
:hammer_and_wrench: [remove useless field in message subs  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/75e20a0bbd40e6e8663d6e20d55d60a221b35801) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update open-login-callback after fx/def macro fix  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e93906c0d9ff3a5dac09d7d058288a6e5fcbcb37) by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)

 - - -

# STARGAZERS
Last week there were 9 stagazers.
:star: [JonHill24](https://github.com/JonHill24)
:star: [n1l-404](https://github.com/n1l-404)
